concept.title: Amenities
concept.shortdesc: We in the Virginia Tech English department are willing and able to provide the following materials and amenities:

ul.li: Extra staff: Our English club is willing and able to provide any manual services required.
Hokie Gear: Both rooms are fully stocked with Virginia Tech pens, notepads, and stressballs shaped like the Hokie bird.

Technical Support:While we keep our labs up-to-date and perform regular matinence, sometimes things just go wrong. If anything should occur, contact us immediately and we will have someone there as soon as possible.

li.b: If you need any other specific equiptment, please inform us when you are making your reservation.
